original_text: They are exalted for a little while, but are gone and brought low; they are taken out of the way as all other, and cut off as the tops of the ears of corn.
korean_text: 그들은 잠깐 동안 높아졌다가 천대를 받을 것이며 잘려 모아진 곡식 이삭처럼 되리라

sentences.original_text: They are exalted for a little while
but are gone and brought low
they are taken out of the way as all other
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 모든 것들처럼 길에서 치워지며

sentences.original_text: and cut off as the tops of ears of corn
